Back to Sergei Prokofiev

Sergei Prokofiev

Symphony no. 1 in D major, op. 25 (Classical)

1916–1917

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 13' 30"

  • 1. Allegro
  • 2. Larghetto
  • 3. Gavotte: Non troppo allegro
  • 4. Finale: Molto vivace

This is an arrangement of an orchestral symphony.

1. Allegro

Duration: 4'

Difficulty: 4.5

2. Larghetto

Duration: 4'

Difficulty: 4

3. Gavotte: Non troppo allegro

Prokofiev re-used this gavotte in his ballet Romeo and Juliet (op. 64).

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 3

4. Finale: Molto vivace

Duration: 4'

Difficulty: 4
